Dinotron is hammered in the chest by Rust's cannons. As he falls back onto his butt, he notices an arrow wizzing by, just barely missing his head. He gets back up and comfronts Aerotaur. 
"Its none of your buisness horseboy!" He yells."I suggest you just leave us alone, Or else!"
He fires another optic blast back at Rust. And one at Aerotaur.
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> ::Aerotaur::
> � � As he approaches the minor battle he attempts his first transformation. �
> On his first try he forms into a horse. �Rather upset he tries again and 
> becomes a bird. �He finally reverts to his combined form and realizes he has 
> weapons in this form. �He decides to try for robot mode later and arms 
> himself. �He draws a bow and arrow and launches one arrow into Whistler's 
> other shoulder (the one previously undamaged) disabling his weapons and 
> sending him into stasis lock. �He fires another two arrows. �One aimed 
> directly at Dinotron's head the other at Rust's head. �His shots fired he 
> asks "Why are you fighting?"
>
